name: Arboreas
description:
You have to defend the forest against an epidemic.

You can left click to cut a tree to prevent the propagation of the disease
Or you can Right click to heal each tree once.

You can move your camera using WASD or putting your mouse on the sides of the screen. You can Zoom/Unzoom with the mouse wheel.

It was the first game jam in a while, and was kinda rough but so much fun !
So i hope you have fun with our game and send us some feedbacks !
And don't hesitate to send your high score.
